message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been valued at $150 by you. Considering its quality and unique features, I believe it's an excellent investment for you. I'm offering it to you today at a special introductory price of $120. This is a great opportunity to own a product that truly exceeds your expectations at a very reasonable cost. Don't miss out on this chance to enhance your experience with our product. Let me know if you're interested!
